text:
Hello Kakashi!! 
Bhai 4 saal mujhe tolerate karne ke liye thankyou :P
And as hota rightfully said teri taang khichai and chidhana was just an expression of our friendship, still agar kabhi kuch zyada ho gaya ho to uske liye sorry. 
Also bhai thankyou for all those assignments and doubt clearing sessions before the exams, bc that really helped me passing some crucial courses, Dill se dhanyawaad.
Baaki hardworking toh tum ho hi but I we suggest you to not get easily depressed and be confident.

I wish that the future brings yo a lot of joy, happiness and success.

Aur haan you are a true gamer, so be proud :)
author: Sudhanshu Pratap Singh

text:
Namaste Sir,

Pehele toh thankyou for being their to listen to my emotional and depressing rants and supporting and encouraging me. And haan, I will take full credit for your mini-militia addiction :P, still aapse bhi meine bhahut shikha hai and I thankyou for that.

In the end mere fellow Mechenchi thankyou for being their to support me and I wish that the future brings you happiness and success and haan Lets meet soon!!
author: Sudhanshu Pratap Singh

text:
Black (aka potdar :P), first of all thankyou for being a great friend and my true non-veg buddy (welp baad mein hata nahi bhi join kar liya tha :P) and haan bahi hamesh BBQ mein Non-veg waale kahi kat ta hai [me mostly :< ] still those BBQ trips, late night Hall 4 /Hall 1 ki canteen were fun AF.

And haan the song name was 'Joker' that got me and hota hooked to Kpop, so amm thankyou (I guess).

And haan we will get our win streak (hopefully :P) also man 4 years flew by fast still our 4 man squad is strong and will remain so in the future :).
author: Sudhanshu Pratap Singh

text:
Aur mere all time roomie!!

Bhai the years flew by really fast, BC abhi kal ka hi din lagta hai when we first met each other. Unnecessary night-outs, and the determination ki saala breakfast kar ke hi soyenge :P

Aur haan apna 4 man squad, be it fortnite,league,etc., its you guys that makes them fun and after that late night canteen with Kakashi be like aaj phir Rs100-150 phook diye XD. Fun days!

All in all THANKYOU for bearing with me for all these years and making my college life more fulfilling and fun.

I wish you a happy and a prosperous future and haan do stay in touch :)

Arre haan bahi apna woh Goa waala trip bhi pending hai don't forget :D
(BC hum chaar Goa pakka jhaayenge :D)
author: Sudhanshu Pratap Singh

text:
Are sir!!

Bhai thankyou for being a great friend and chaapu toh tum pehele se hi ho, aise hi mehenat karte raho kisi din bhahut bade insaan banoge :) 

It was fun being in our company my fellow Mechenchi :)
Hope we meet soon.
author: Sudhanshu Pratap Singh
